Back to Ludwig van Beethoven

Ludwig van Beethoven

Variations and Fugue in E-flat major, op. 35

1802 · Biamonti 328

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

The theme is followed by fifteen variations and a fugue. Beethoven used the same theme in the finale of the ballet Die Geschöpfe des Prometheus (op. 43), a contredanse for orchestra (WoO 14 no. 7), and the finale of the symphony no. 3 (op. 55).

Recommended editions

  • Neue Gesamtausgabe (Henle) · VII/5 · HN 4272 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Joseph Schmidt-Görg
  • Henle · HN 1269 · Variationen für Klavier / Band II · ed. Felix Loy
  • Henle · HN 1299 · ed. Felix Loy
  • Könemann · K 196 · Variationen II · ed. István Máriássy
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50024 · Variationen für Klavier / Band 1 · ed. Erwin Ratz

Duration: 24'

Difficulty: 4.5
